itunes:title: Episode 1126 - Ari Shaffir
title: Episode 1126 - Ari Shaffir
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
description:
Comedian Ari Shaffir joins the show to talk about his new comedy special "Jew" out NOW on YouTube -- plus why he thinks all actors should be murdered, why Bert Kreischer is a loser, and the strategy Kanye West needs to get away with saying mean things about Jewish people.


Watch Ari's new standup special "Jew" on YouTube right now!
